tool_description: Sorts and ranks accommodation search results based on multiple criteria including price, rating, distance, and custom scoring.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to sort

sort_criteria.description: Primary sort field: price_low, price_high, rating, distance, popularity, value_score

property_prices.description: Prices corresponding to each property (required for price sorting)

property_ratings.description: Ratings corresponding to each property (required for rating sorting)

property_distances.description: Distances corresponding to each property (required for distance sorting)

limit_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

error_messages: Invalid sort criteria: Use price_low, price_high, rating, distance, popularity, or value_score.
Missing required data: Provide property_prices for price sorting, property_ratings for rating sorting, property_distances for distance sorting.
Array length mismatch: All provided arrays must have the same length as property_ids.
Invalid limit_results: Must be between 1 and 100.
Empty property list: Provide at least one property ID to sort.
Invalid secondary sort: Secondary sort criteria must be different from primary criteria.
usage: Provide property_ids and sort_criteria, along with required data arrays (prices, ratings, or distances depending on sort criteria). Optionally set secondary_sort and limit_results.

sorted_property_ids.description: Property IDs sorted according to specified criteria

sort_scores.description: Sort scores used for ranking (lower is better for price/distance)

ranking_summary.description: Summary of sort criteria and number of results
